amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the Department of Energy, Energy Programs, Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy Account by $30 million and increase the Science Administrative and Facility Account for National Laboratories by $15 million and to apply the savings to deficit reduction.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the Department of Energy, Energy Programs, Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy Account by $30 million and increase the Science Administrative and Facility Account for National Laboratories by the same amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hultgren amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 130 - 256 (Roll no. 309).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Hultgren amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 130 - 256 (Roll no. 309).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Hultgren.
